body_html:
I was also using Keras/Tensorflow inside Jupyter notebooks. The first notebook worked OK. The second gave the UnknownError: Fail to find the dnn implementation.
After closing the first notebook (Save + Close/Halt), the second notebook started to work again.
Note: both notebooks used the same CuDNNLSTM layer.
body_text:
I was also using Keras/Tensorflow inside Jupyter notebooks. The first notebook worked OK. The second gave the UnknownError: Fail to find the dnn implementation.

body:
I was also using Keras/Tensorflow inside Jupyter notebooks. The first notebook worked OK. The second gave the UnknownError: Fail to find the dnn implementation.
After closing the first notebook (Save + Close/Halt), the second notebook started to work again.
Note: both notebooks used the same CuDNNLSTM layer.
